name: striffer
description: Finds difference between two or more strings

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && uglifyjs ./src/striffer.js > ./dist/striffer.min.js -b beautify=false,preamble="'/*! Finds difference between strings - v0.1 - 2019; Licensed MIT */'"

author: Antony Belov <cerberus.ab@mail.ru>
